text: Bram van der Vlugt (28 May 1934 â€“ 19 December 2020) was a Dutch actor. He was born in The Hague. He was known for playing the role of Sinterklaas. He also starred in Pastorale 1943, Tropic of Emerald and in Family. Van der Vlugt died on 19 December 2020 from COVID-19 in Utrecht, Netherlands at the age of 86.Acteur Bram van der Vlugt (86) overleden ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in the Netherlands Category:Dutch movie actors Category:Dutch stage actors Category:Dutch television actors Category:Dutch voice actors Category:Actors from The Hague
